title: Jessica Biel leaves little to the imagination in a racy sheer black lace jumpsuit
text:
She has been busy promoting her new Facebook Watch series Limetown.

And Jessica Biel made sure she turned heads as she appeared on Late Night with Seth Meyers on Wednesday.

The Sinner star, 37, looked sensational as she left little to the imagination in a racy sheer black lace jumpsuit.

Stunning: Jessica Biel made sure she turned heads as she appeared on Late Night with Seth Meyers on Wednesday

Jessica's daring item of clothing showcased her toned figure and flashed her black bralette worn underneath.

Adding some finishing touches and height to her frame, the star accessorised her look with a pair of Christian Louboutin heels.

Jessica styled her brunette locks into a glossy blow-dried hairdo and added a slick of stunning make-up which enhanced her pretty features.

The star appeared in good spirits as she shared several backstage videos ahead of her TV debut.

Wow: The Sinner star, 37, looked sensational as she left little to the imagination in a racy sheer black lace jumpsuit

Details: Jessica's daring item of clothing showcased her toned figure and flashed her black bralette worn underneath

In one clip, Jessica nibbled on some snacks as an entourage of beauty crew applied her make-up, she captioned the video with a squirrel emoji.

The actress was visiting the Late Night with Seth Meyers show to promote her new programme Limetown which premiered last week on Facebook Watch.

Jessica plays an investigative journalist working to solve the mystery of a town that disappeared 15 years before.

Lavish: Adding some finishing touches and height to her frame, the star accessorised her look with a pair of Christian Louboutin heels

Glamorous: Jessica styled her brunette locks into a glossy blow-dried hairdo and added a slick of stunning make-up which enhanced her pretty features

Casual: Jessica stepped out for dinner with her friends after her TV appearance in NYC wearing a casual ensemble of jeans with a white knitted jumper

The actress has been starring in several thriller dramas recently and was praised by fans for her portrayal of Cora Tannetti in The Sinner, which she also produced.

Jessica was nominated for several awards for her leading role, including a Golden Globe and Emmy.

In her personal life, the actress recently celebrated her seven-year wedding anniversary to husband Justin Timberlake.

The couple tied the knot in a romantic Italian ceremony in 2012 and have one son together, Silas, four, who was born in April 2015.
description: The Sinner star, 37, looked sensational as she left little to the imagination in a racy sheer black lace jumpsuit.
